name: Schema Discriminator 1
title: Schema Discriminator 1: Nasopharynx/PharyngealTonsil
notes:
**Note:** A schema discriminator is used to discriminate for primary site C111: Posterior wall of nasopharynx. Code the specific site in which the tumor arose.

* **00090: Nasopharynx (see code 1)**
     Used to stage for the following primary site description: posterior wall of nasopharynx (NOS)

* **00100 (HPV-Mediated (p16+)) or 00111 (Oropharyngeal Cancer or Oropharynx (p16-)) (see code 2)**
Oropharynx Staging Systems are used for the following primary site descriptions. An additional schema discriminator will be used to distinguish between the AJCC HPV-Mediated (p16+) Oropharyngeal Cancer and Oropharynx (p16-) and Hypopharynx Staging System 
  * Adenoid
   * Pharyngeal tonsil
rows: Primary Site is NOT C111, Discriminator is not necessary
